citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on
November 2, 2023. It was reported to the APHIS official that the registrant was out of the state at the time the inspection
was attempted.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on 
November 2, 2023. It was reported to the APHIS official that the registrant was out of the state at the time the inspection 
was attempted. 
 
 
End Section
